Pizza Toppings
Cheeses
Mozzarella, Feta, Parmesan, and Vegan Cheese options

Meats

Veggies
Fresh Garlic, Onions, Tomatoes, Mushrooms, Pineapple, Green Olives, Black Olives, Green Peppers, Pickles, Jalapeno Peppers, Banana Peppers, Pickles

Subs
10″ Pizza Sub – $9.99 + tax
Pizza sub served with pepperoni, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, or cheddar cheese.

10″ B.L.T Sub – $9.99 + tax
Bacon, lettuce, and tomatoes, with your choice of mayo, mustard, honey mustard, Italian, ranch, or caesar dressing, served with mozzarella or cheddar.

10″ Meatball Sub – $9.99 + tax
Five meatballs with tomato sauce and one choice of either mozzarella, parmesan, or cheddar.

Wings
Wings (12pcs) – $14.99 + tax
One order comes with 12 wings.

Wings Combo (24pcs) – $31.99 + tax
Twenty-four wings, two dips, and a two-litre pop.

Pasta & meatballs – $9.99 + tax
Comes with 2 meatballs and pasta.
